text:
Hi all, I am working on the development of a new template with contact form and map. I am quite new as Hubspost developer (only 2 months), and in these last days I learnt a lot how to add the functionalities to the pages, but there is still something that I miss in the logic of the development of a template. I mean, I know how to develop a basic template, but if I have to add a background image also if I add the functionality I can't see it as background.
maybe it is because JS or there are other reasons in HubSpot logic?

hey <@U01C13EEQ85>, this channel is for content on the academy.  You should check out <https://academy.HubSpot.com/courses/cms-for-developers?library=true|this certification course> there.  For specific questions to templates, there is a channel called <#CFPGEKRJ7|templates>.  You can also ask your question in the developer community <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Developers/ct-p/developers|here>.
Excited to see what you build!
